entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:18 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -38.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 04:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -38.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -41.8°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming partly cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
